div.p: Identification of the underlying physiological mechanism for a Reaction Risk
This value set defines its own terms in the system http://hl7.org/fhir/allergy-intolerance-type

tr.td: Immune mediated reaction, including allergic reactions and hypersensitivities.

A non-immune mediated reaction, which can include pseudoallergic reactions, side effects, intolerances, drug toxicities (eg to Gentamicin), drug-drug interactions, food-drug interactions, and drug-disease interactions.
